overview.en: CRUST provides a decentralized storage network of Web3 ecosystem. It supports multiple storage layer protocols such as IPFS, and exposes storage interfaces to application layer. Crust's technical stack is also capable of supporting a decentralized computing layer. It is designed to build a decentralized cloud ecosystem that values data privacy and ownership.
overview.zh: CRUST提供了Web3⽣态系统的去中⼼化存储⽹络，⽀持包括IPFS在内的多种存储层协议，并对应⽤层提供接⼝。Crust的技术栈还能够⽀持去中⼼化计算层。Crust旨在构建⼀个重视数据隐私和所有权的分散式云⽣态系统。
